attributes.action: Maglev trains around London and up the UK
attributes.additional_details:
A high-speed Maglev train system circling London parallel to the M25 connecting all the airports for efficiency as well as connecting them and the rest of London to the rest of the country. Instead of HS2, Maglev trains will enable faster speeds, cheaper running costs and lower prices.

Also, instead of privatisation it should be state-owned for profits to be put back into other transportation schemes in the UK.
